column3: Also whats with the maintaining - I had totally different layout of this pr when it got closed by another maintainer. Feels like i was sleepworking ahahah
This is an [upstream file](https://github.com/kadwanev/retry). We don't want to unnecessarily modify it here. Although feel free to open a PR at the upstream repo.

NACK renaming the file. This has been [proposed](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14991#issuecomment-448189663) before and turned down.\n\n> No need to rename the file every time apple changes the name of the operating system. This will break all external links.
Correct me, but last name change was a fix because osx=os10. So next change would be when apple decide to merge ios and macos since current layout does not really have such verbal limitations.
It would be easier to skip this one, thats for sure. But what if its gonna stick for another decade :)
